description: This phone is great for making calls and is very efficient! It was a great buy and I would recommend it to anyone!
Use_cases:
-Phone worked well for some people in Cuba, providing clear calls and a good internet connection. 
-For people with AT&T in the US, the phone did not work and was not compatible with the network.
-The phone is cheaply made and came with an old Android version.
phrases:
good product
excellent phone
great phone
good buy
nice phone
